/* include all referenced room classes */
#include "TemplateModel/ADASMessage.h"


/* message IDs */
enum PSendData_msg_ids {
	PSendData_MSG_MIN = 0,
	PSendData_OUT_recursive = 1,
	PSendData_IN_sendData = 2,
	PSendData_MSG_MAX = 3
};

/*--------------------- port structs and methods */
typedef etPort PSendDataPort;
typedef etReplPort PSendDataReplPort;


void PSendDataPort_recursive(const PSendDataPort* self);
void PSendDataReplPort_recursive_broadcast(const PSendDataReplPort* self);
void PSendDataReplPort_recursive(const PSendDataReplPort* self, int idx);


etInt32 PSendDataReplPort_getReplication(const PSendDataReplPort* self);
typedef etPort PSendDataConjPort;
typedef etReplPort PSendDataConjReplPort;


void PSendDataConjPort_sendData(const PSendDataConjPort* self, ADASMessage* data);
void PSendDataConjReplPort_sendData_broadcast(const PSendDataConjReplPort* self, ADASMessage* data);
void PSendDataConjReplPort_sendData(const PSendDataConjReplPort* self, int idx, ADASMessage* data);


etInt32 PSendDataConjReplPort_getReplication(const PSendDataConjReplPort* self);
